title: Tata Motors’ board approves company’s demerger plan
description: As a part of the scheme, TML will demerge its commercial vehicle undertaking involving the CV business including all the assets, liabilities and employees relating to the business and all its related investments into TMLCV. Further, the existing passenger vehicle business in TMPV, will be merged into TML, the existing listed entity.
